page.title: 11THE GRENOSIDE TRADITIONAL
page.content: The Grenoside sword dancing team started over a hundred years ago in the nineteenth century.There are 6 dancers, a captain,and a fidler.The men wear decorated red paisley jackets which are over 30 years old,white trousers with red stripes down the sides,and a black cricket cap with gold edging.The captain wears an animal skin hat it is now fox fur as it is made out of a discarded fur coat.They all wear black clogs which are iron shod.One of the dancers is a clog maker which is very useful. Their "new"swords were presented to them in 1933.They are not very sharp but they have been known to draw blood.The Grenoside Traditional dance is performed every Boxing-day at 11 am to celebrate the winter solstice.
